text: The 2005 Iranian Super Cup was held on 28 August 2005 between the 2004–05 Iran Pro League champions Foolad and the 2004–05 Hazfi Cup winners Saba. ==Match== {| width=92% |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |- |colspan="4"|Foolad |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK || || Ebrahim Mirzapour |- |DF || || Mohammad Alavi |- |DF || || Jalal Kameli Mofrad|| || || || |- |DF || || Hossein Kaebi |- |DF || || Pejman Montazeri |- |MF || || Omid Sharifinasab |- | || || Ali Elhami|| || || || |- |MF || || Adel Kolahkaj|| || || || |- |MF || || Nader Ahmadi |- |MF || || Iman Mobali|| || |- | || || Asghar Rameshgar|| || || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- | || || Karim Hazbavipour || || || || |- |MF || || Meysam Soleimani|| || || || |- |MF || || Milad Nouri || || || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=3| Mladen Frančić |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" |- |colspan="4"|Saba Battery |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK || || Almir Tolja |- |DF || || Morteza Asadi |- | || || Mohsen Soltani|| || || || |- |DF || || Sohrab Bakhtiarizadeh |- | || || Amir Alvandi |- | || || Ali Ghasemian|| || || || |- |MF || || Mohammad Navazi|| || || || |- |MF || || Amir Hossein Yousefi|| || || || |- | || || Mostafa Mehdizadeh |- |FW || || Saeid Daghighi|| || || || |- |FW || || Ali Daei|| || || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |MF || || Yadollah Akbari|| || || || |- | || || Babak Zolrahmi|| || || || |- |FW || || Robert Markosi|| || || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=3| Majid Jalali |} |} ==References== Iranian Super Cup
